entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 13 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
